import numpy as np
from matplotlib import pyplot as plt
import cv2
from PIL import Image

source.28123289:
def augment_and_show(aug, image):
    image = aug(image=image)['image']
    plt.figure(figsize=(5,5))
    plt.imshow(image)

source.586cfe1e:
# Combination1
def augment_flips_color(p=0.5):
    return Compose([
        CLAHE(),
        RandomRotate90(),
        Transpose(),
        ShiftScaleRotate(shift_limit=0.0625, scale_limit=0.50, rotate_limit=45, p=0.75),
        Blur(blur_limit=3),
        OpticalDistortion(),
        GridDistortion(),
        HueSaturationValue()
    ], p=p)
source.e79f8f5c:
# Combination2
def strong_aug(p=0.5):
    return Compose([
        RandomRotate90(),
        Flip(),
        Transpose(),
        OneOf([
            GaussNoise(),
        ], p=0.2),
        OneOf([
            MotionBlur(p=0.2),
            MedianBlur(blur_limit=3, p=0.1),
            Blur(blur_limit=3, p=0.1),
        ], p=0.2),
        ShiftScaleRotate(shift_limit=0.0625, scale_limit=0.2, rotate_limit=45, p=0.2),
        OneOf([
            OpticalDistortion(p=0.3),
            GridDistortion(p=0.1),
            PiecewiseAffine(p=0.3),
        ], p=0.2),
        OneOf([
            CLAHE(clip_limit=2),
            Sharpen(),
            IAAEmboss(),
            RandomContrast(),
            RandomBrightness(),
        ], p=0.3),
        HueSaturationValue(p=0.3),
    ], p=p)
